[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@boba-cli/dsl](./dsl.md) &gt; [PaginatorBuilderOptions](./dsl.paginatorbuilderoptions.md)

## PaginatorBuilderOptions interface

Options for the paginator component builder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface PaginatorBuilderOptions 
```

## Remarks

Configure the paginator display style and behavior when creating a paginator component.
